cause.description:
There are sooooo many people killed each year in drinking and driving related accidents ! The people that choose to get into their vehicle and drive under the influence should not only be PUT behind bars they should STAY behind bars NO MATTER WHO you are WHAT you're worth or WHO you know ! Am I right or am I RIGHT ?!!!!!!
1. She's a Bitch
2. She's a Rich Bitch
3. She's a Dumb Bitch !
cause.name: Who gives a SHIT about Paris Hilton !!!
